articles.author: Sammy Westfall, Leo Sands
articles.title: Southern Europeans protest overtourism with water pistols - The Washington Post
articles.description: Hundreds of demonstrators marched through Barcelona, Lisbon, Venice and other European cities over the weekend, protesting the negative effects of overtourism.
articles.content:
As the summer tourist season comes into swing, hundreds of locals, some holding water guns, gathered in major destinations in Spain, Italy and Portugal on Sunday to protest overtourism.
Footage from… [+3132 chars]

articles.title: A look at the first artificial solar eclipses created by two European satellites - AP News
articles.description: A pair of European satellites have created the first artificial solar eclipses through precise and fancy formation flying. The result is hours of on-demand totality for scientists. The European Space Agency released the eclipse pictures Monday. Launched late …
articles.content: CAPE CANAVERAL, Fla. (AP) A pair of European satellites have created the first artificial solar eclipses by flying in precise and fancy formation, providing hours of on-demand totality for scientists… [+3262 chars]
